inclusion.criterion: planned for cardiac catheterization as part of pre-operative (SAVR) or pre-percutaneous (TAVI) work up
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: intermediate (50-90%) coronary lesion that requires further evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: male, or if female, has no childbearing potential or is not pregnant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: emergency and/or the patient is unstable
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous coronary artery by-pass in the artery being assessed
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Contra-indications for adenosine administration: severe asthma or pre-existing type 2 AV-block
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No significant coronary artery disease (<50% stenosis on angiography)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Critical coronary artery disease deemed by the Heart Team to require immediate revascularization
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and is planned for cardiac catheterization as part of pre-operative (SAVR) or pre-percutaneous (TAVI) work up. He does not have any exclusion criteria that would make him ineligible.
